FuncDef:
The roam-domain command configures a roaming domain for an LNS.
The undo roam-domain command restores the default configuration.
By default, no roaming domain is configured for an LNS.

ParaDef.Info:
The domain name of LNS roaming domain must be an existing domain.
The value is a string of 1 to 64 characters.

ExtraInfo: To configure a roaming domain for an LNS, run the roam-domain command. When users of this LNS send packets carrying domain names that cannot be identified, the configured roaming domain can be used for these users for authentication.
